text: Abercorn F.C. is a former football club. They were based in Paisley, Scotland. They played in the Scottish Football League from 1890 until 1915. The club's colours were blue and white stripes. Category:Scottish football clubs Category:1877 establishments in Scotland Category:1920 disestablishments in Europe Category:1920s disestablishments in the United Kingdom
title: Abercorn F.C.
